text: <!here> Seems that export_to_template_context doesn't work for blog posts in DM2. Trying to bring a custom property over into the listing view and it doesn't seem to be coming across. Ideas?

quick question! after creating a module in design manager and adding some field values am I missing something to have them show on the 'Edit Page' module? Thanks

I was able to import a module from another portal and was able to see the field values on the edit page...I think I'll take that approach for now

We updated an advance menu name and the name did not update in the menu modules. Is this normal? We're in the process of updating multiple templates for a client that has very messy template organization from a prior agency.
